com.googlecode.aluminumproject.context.g11n
Class GlobalisationContext

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.aluminumproject.context.g11n.GlobalisationContext

public class GlobalisationContext
extends Object

Aggregates globalisation information providers for globalised library elements.

Normally, globalisation contexts will be made available by the globalisation context provider; in that case, the current globalisation context can be obtained using the designated method.

Field Summary

from

public static GlobalisationContext from(Context context)
                                 throws ContextException
Finds a globalisation context in a context.

Parameters:
context - the current context
Returns:
the current globalisation context
Throws:
ContextException - when the given context does not contain a globalisation context
